attributes.action: Insist on the constitutional convention of ministerial responsibility leading to the resignation of Defence Secretary Des Browne.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is for a minister to be fully accountable and to take FULL responsibility for serious errors within his or her department. That serving members of the armed forces have been able to sell their story is despicable and an insult to the families who have lost relatives during this wider middle-east "mission". Des Browne has no option but to "fall on his sword" - not only must he take responsibility for whoever allowed this to happen - he must accept responsibility for the poor manner in which he has handled the subsequent issues.

rejection.details: This petition is very similar to an existing one: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Navy-media/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
